Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Chicago Ave/Austin
ShortDescription: EB 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted: From the Terminal right turn, Chicago, Austin, Augusta, Central, and Chicago due to street blockage near Chicago Ave/Austin.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Northbound Reroute near 53rd/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: Northbound 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th, University and 53rd: due to, street blockage near 53rd/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th, University and 53rd: due to, street blockage near 53rd/Woodlawn.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to a door problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
